title: Bands Metadata field
description: Defines the metadata field in the table bands of Brazil Data Cube Data Model.

expression.title: Define the metadata to generate custom bands in run time.

bands.title: The required bands identifier used in expression to build customized band.

value.title: The string-like expression to build customized band
value.description: The string-like expression to build customized band. You can use this field to generate index bands like Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI), Enhanced Vegetation Index (EVI) and so on. The expression uses the band name or band common name to manipulate the array-like values.
